$interpreted: Sione: Watch me first. My back is straight, I'm holding my sword steady. Don't hesitate when you take a swing.
Wendel: Um, okay! Like this?
Sione: Good, just keep that posture! Now, swing--
Wendel: Agh, I'm sorry! I'm sorry! I messed up again...
Sione: It's no problem. You're already much improved from when you started. I'm sure with some more practice you'll catch up to everyone else.
Wendel: T-Thank you, Sione. I haven't heard such kind words since both of my parents passed...
Sione: Is that so...
Wendel: I will do my best not to let you down, Sione! Your instruction and kindness won't be in vain!
Sione: Well, that was the afternoon bell. How about we take a rest?
Wendel: I'll go grab lunch for us! That's something I can do!
Sione: Wen---
Sione: ...Ah, no matter. I'll give it to him later.
Ace: (His looks, behavior, aptitude... none of it meets Aldric family standards.)
Ace: (How could my Sione have feelings for a man like that?)
Hungry Soldier: Well, if it isn't little Wendy Wendel, resident numbskull!
Hungry Soldier: How about you save your lunch for the real soldiers, Wendy? Morons like you doesn't deserve to eat!
Wendel: ...Uh... um...
Wendel: Is that a new rule?
Wendel: I guess you're right, maybe I haven't been performing well enough to deserve lunch... I'll just grab one portion for Sione, then...

Hungry Soldier: Oh man, moron thinks I was serious! Bwahaha!!
He's too easy to mess with, I'm starting to feel bad!
Wendel: Uh, did I say something wrong?
Ace: (...These soldiers shouldn't be teasing one of their own. And yet, this boy shouldn't be taking such abuse, either.)
Ace: (How could he actually believe those soldiers? What a fool...)
Ace: Leave---
Sione: Leave him alone!!
Sione: In this army, every soldier is valued equally. We're a family here, and everyone deserves to eat!
Sione: Show some respect and responsibility!
Ace: (Wow, my little sister, just as amazing as always... No man deserves to be with her...)
Ace: Sio---
Wendel: Sione~~ I'm so sorry, I messed up again!!
Sione: Don't worry about it. By the way, you dropped your pendant. I know it means a lot to you, so try and be more careful.
Sione: Don't cry, just eat your lunch.
Wendel: No, Sione, this is for you! Please, eat, you're too skinny!
Sione: No, you eat.
Ace: (...She can't.)
Ace: (Sione, please don't...)
Ace: (I won't allow it...)
Nervous Guard: It's all your fault, blabbermouth! If you hadn't said anything, Sir Aldric wouldn't be about to have an aneurysm right now!
Quiet Guard: ...Whatever, let's just wait until he calms down first.
Rookie Captain: Sir Ace!
Nervous Guard: ---Please, Captain, wait.
Nervous Guard: Sir Aldric needs some space right now.
Rookie Captain: Did something happen?
Ace: ...No, everything is fine.
Rookie Captain: Sir Aldric, none of my men told me you were coming to inspect the barracks today!
Rookie Captain: That is unforgivable, I will reprimand them immediately after you return. Please, if you would not report this...
Ace: Worry not, I will not report this to the commander.
Ace: My inspection is complete, anyway. You can tell everyone to get back to their posts.
Rookie Captain: Ace looked rather pale today, not himself... He must have something on his mind...
Rookie Captain: You all better tell me what he was doing here today, or---
Rookie Captain: Wendel... That pimple-faced sack of crap thinks he can cozy up to Sione!?
Rookie Captain: If Aldric ends up making a fuss about this and messing up my chance for a promotion...
rookie Captain: ---I'll kill him!!
Nervous Guard: Oh no, we weren't able to help Sir Aldric at all...
Quiet Guard: He must be feeling terrible right now.
Quiet Guard: Well, maybe we can try something else, then?
Nervous Guard: Hold on, now, don't be hasty!
Quiet Guard: Sir Aldric, I heard there was a diviner around here somewhere. They're supposed to be the best of the best. Everything they foresee comes true!
Quiet Guard: If you aren't sure how to solve your woes, then... maybe they can help!
Nervous Guard: What, a diviner? How could someone as noble and wise as Sir Aldric accept the ramblings of some hack!?
Ace: ...Fine.
Nervous Guard: Eh!?!?
Jenna: Come on, give me back my wishing stone!
Drunk Guy: Sweetheart~ Why worry so much about your brother's love? Why not consider your own love life?
Drunk Guy: We could be star-crossed lovers, you know!
Jenna: My brother is a soldier! If you touch a hair on my head, he'll hunt you down! I swear!!
Ace: Make way.
Drunk Guy: Yo, Mr. Big Shot, who do you think you are taking my girl?
Drunk Guy: You her brother or something?
Drunk Guy: How about having me for a brother-in-law, hehe--
Ace: Sexual harassment, blocking foot traffic, public drunkenness, and disrespecting a noble? I could have you killed for any one of those things.
Ace: ...Good thing I can forgive all of those transgressions.
Ace: But mistaking this woman for my one-of-a-kind little sister, Sione, and being so blatantly disgusting, that is unforgivable!
Sober Guy: I'm sorry! I-I didn't know!!
Ace: I'm having you locked up so you can think about what you've done! Men, arrest him!!
Jenna: Ahh! My wishing stone!!
Jenna: Thank goodness my wishing stone is okay! I saved up for so long just so the diviner could enchant it! if something happened to it...
Jenna: Thank you for helping me back there, kind sir! May I... ask your name?
Ace: Don't thank me. I wasn't planning on helping you, he just got in my way.
Jenna: Oh...
Jenna: Well, still, think you for returning my wishing stone to me. I hope we'll have a chance to meet again in the future.
Ace: Hold on.
Jenna: Yes? Can I help you with something?
Ace: You just said this stone has been enchanted? What kind of use does it have now?
Jenna: Oh, are you interested in wishing stones, too?
Jenna: Well, apparently if I make a wish to this stone, it'll come true!
Jenna: So, I want to make a wish for my brother. He's joined the army just for me, so he's completely abandoned his own love life...
Jenna: I'm sorry, of course you're not interested in my own problems...
Ace: Yes, some of that was definitely... too much information.
Jenna: Oh...
Ace: But... If he were to find someone else he loved, then you would cease to be the only one he cared about.
Jenna: I know, and I am scared of that, but...
Diviner: Aren't you Sir Ace of the Aldric family!?
Diviner: Please, how can I help you? I will do all in my power!
Ace: I want to know if the rumors are true.
Diviner: ...What rumors?
Ace: You're a diviner!! Shouldn't you already know!? Fraud is a serious crime in our kingdom, you know!!
Diviner: O-Of course I know, I was just testing you! Worry not, Sir Aldric, I will give you the best, most accurate reading of all time!
Diviner: (Ace Aldric, young and promising, the most eligible bachelor in all the kingdom...)
Diviner: (...If someone of his status would come and see me, he must be facing quite a serious problem...)
Ace: What is it? If you can't foresee the answer, then---
Diviner: Ah! I see it! The girl you care about most!!
Diviner: Ohh, I see a very large probability that... this girl's heart does not lie with you! But...
Ace: ---What did you say!?
Diviner: (---Uh oh!)
Diviner: (---I was just making some stuff up, do you think he could tell!?)
Diviner: I-I-I promise that everything I've said is true! I give you my word!
Ace: ...So that means she's already found someone...
Ace: Someone who she cares about more than me!?
Diviner: (Eh...? Is Sir Ace truly here about love? Did I guess right!?)
Diviner: Yes... it may seem unfortunate for you, but...
Diviner: Fear not! I have just the thing!
Diviner: Now, usually I wouldn't give this to just anyone. But, since you are a noble of the Aldric family, I think I can make an exception!
Jenna: You're right, not receiving all of my brother's attention anymore is what I fear most... That said...
Jenna: I want him to be happy, too. If he can find someone that truly makes him happy for the rest of his life, then I can handle being a little lonely.
Jenna: I care about my brother's happiness more than my own, anyway...
Ace: (Our family would never allow Sione to wed a commoner. Nobles can only marry other nobles.)
Ace: (And yet, as a brother, my number one responsibility is to assure my sister's happiness.)
Diviner: What do you think, Sir Aldric?
Diviner: If you want to stop their love from taking root, this stone will make that wish come true---
Diviner: You can stop their love where it stands!
Ace: I never said I wanted to stop it!
Ace: No one can stop my sister from falling in love!
Ace: As Sione's loving brother, I...
Ace: I won't allow it!

Good, just keep that posture! Now, swing--
Agh, I'm sorry! I'm sorry! I messed up again...

If you hadn't said anything, Sir Aldric wouldn't be about to have an aneurysm right now!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Quiet Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Whatever, let's just wait until he calms down first.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"0_no_face","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sir Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"---Please, Captain, wait.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sir Aldric needs some space right now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Did something happen?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_19_003","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...No, everything is fine.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sir Aldric, none of my men told me you were coming to inspect the barracks today!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That is unforgivable, I will reprimand them immediately after you return. Please, if you would not report this...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Worry not, I will not report this to the commander.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_20_003","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My inspection is complete, anyway. You can tell everyone to get back to their posts.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ace looked rather pale today, not himself... He must have something on his mind...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You all better tell me what he was doing here today, or---","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wendel... That pimple-faced sack of crap thinks he can cozy up to Sione!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If Aldric ends up making a fuss about this and messing up my chance for a promotion...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"rookie Captain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0057c3","IconName":"h0057c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"---I'll kill him!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh no, we weren't able to help Sir Aldric at all...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Quiet Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He must be feeling terrible right now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Quiet Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well, maybe we can try something else, then?","sfxName":"human_male_middle_soldier_01_ver1","sfxVolume":0.9},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hold on, now, don't be hasty!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Quiet Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sir Aldric, I heard there was a diviner around here somewhere. They're supposed to be the best of the best. Everything they foresee comes true!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Quiet Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If you aren't sure how to solve your woes, then... maybe they can help!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What, a diviner? How could someone as noble and wise as Sir Aldric accept the ramblings of some hack!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Fine.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eh!?!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Come on, give me back my wishing stone!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Drunk Guy","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0106c3","IconName":"h0106c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sweetheart~ Why worry so much about your brother's love? Why not consider your own love life?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Drunk Guy","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0106c3","IconName":"h0106c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We could be star-crossed lovers, you know!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_30_003","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My brother is a soldier! If you touch a hair on my head, he'll hunt you down! I swear!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_30_004","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Make way.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Drunk Guy","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0106c3","IconName":"h0106c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yo, Mr. Big Shot, who do you think you are taking my girl?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Drunk Guy","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0106c3","IconName":"h0106c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You her brother or something?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Drunk Guy","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0106c3","IconName":"h0106c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How about having me for a brother-in-law, hehe--","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sexual harassment, blocking foot traffic, public drunkenness, and disrespecting a noble? I could have you killed for any one of those things.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Good thing I can forgive all of those transgressions.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But mistaking this woman for my one-of-a-kind little sister, Sione, and being so blatantly disgusting, that is unforgivable!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Sober Guy","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0106c3","IconName":"h0106c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry! I-I didn't know!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_34_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm having you locked up so you can think about what you've done! Men, arrest him!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ahh! My wishing stone!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank goodness my wishing stone is okay! I saved up for so long just so the diviner could enchant it! if something happened to it...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you for helping me back there, kind sir! May I... ask your name?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't thank me. I wasn't planning on helping you, he just got in my way.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_37_002","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well, still, think you for returning my wishing stone to me. I hope we'll have a chance to meet again in the future.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hold on.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes? Can I help you with something?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_40_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You just said this stone has been enchanted? What kind of use does it have now?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, are you interested in wishing stones, too?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well, apparently if I make a wish to this stone, it'll come true!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_41_002","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, I want to make a wish for my brother. He's joined the army just for me, so he's completely abandoned his own love life...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry, of course you're not interested in my own problems...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_42_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes, some of that was definitely... too much information.","sfxName":"h0179sx_story_001","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_42_002","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But... If he were to find someone else he loved, then you would cease to be the only one he cared about.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know, and I am scared of that, but...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_45_000","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Aren't you Sir Ace of the Aldric family!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_45_001","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, how can I help you? I will do all in my power!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_45_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I want to know if the rumors are true.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_45_003","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...What rumors?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_45_004","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're a diviner!! Shouldn't you already know!? Fraud is a serious crime in our kingdom, you know!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_46_000","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"O-Of course I know, I was just testing you! Worry not, Sir Aldric, I will give you the best, most accurate reading of all time!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_47_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_47_001","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Ace Aldric, young and promising, the most eligible bachelor in all the kingdom...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_47_002","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...If someone of his status would come and see me, he must be facing quite a serious problem...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_48_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What is it? If you can't foresee the answer, then---","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_48_001","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah! I see it! The girl you care about most!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_49_000","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ohh, I see a very large probability that... this girl's heart does not lie with you! But...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_49_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"---What did you say!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_49_002","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(---Uh oh!)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_50_000","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(---I was just making some stuff up, do you think he could tell!?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_50_001","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I-I-I promise that everything I've said is true! I give you my word!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_51_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_51_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...So that means she's already found someone...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_51_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Someone who she cares about more than me!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_51_003","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Eh...? Is Sir Ace truly here about love? Did I guess right!?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_52_000","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes... it may seem unfortunate for you, but...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_52_001","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Fear not! I have just the thing!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_53_000","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now, usually I wouldn't give this to just anyone. But, since you are a noble of the Aldric family, I think I can make an exception!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_54_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're right, not receiving all of my brother's attention anymore is what I fear most... That said...","sfxName":"human_female_young_03","sfxVolume":0.9},{"ID":"char_h0179_002_dialog_english##_55_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I want him to be happy, too.
